content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 24-31)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5) with water output
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5) not connected to power network
- Pipe network (system 1904) connecting water systems
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 8.5) not properly connected

### Iron Mining Operation at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 15.5, 70.5) facing right
- Wooden chest (position 17.5, 70.5) currently full (blocking output)
- Small electric pole (position 17.5, 71.5) providing power
- Note: Currently non-functional due to chest blockage and power issues

## ERROR TIPS

### Belt connection errors
- Repeated attempts to connect belts directly to chests (steps 20, 24, 27, 31)
- Solution: Always use inserters between chests and belts - belts cannot connect directly to chests

### Entity positioning conflicts
- Multiple placement attempts where target positions were already occupied (steps 29, 30)
- Solution: Verify target positions are clear before placement using get_entity() checks

### Mining operation issues
- Drill output blocked by full chest (position 17.5,70.5)
- Power connection problems to mining drill
- Solution: 
  - Regularly empty output chests
  - Verify power pole connections and coverage
  - Check drill orientation matches output position

### Boiler operation problems
- Boiler at (-5.0,2.5) shows "out of fuel" warning
- Solution: Implement automated fuel replenishment system or regular manual refueling

### General recommendations
- Verify entity connections after placement (power, belts, pipes)
- Check entity statuses after placement operations
- Implement error handling for common failure cases
- Plan entity placements considering required spacing and connections

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- `connect_entities(source: Entity, target: Entity) -> BeltGroup`
  - Attempts to connect two entities with transport belts
  - Failure modes: 
    - When connecting directly to chests
    - When target position is occupied
    - When source/target entities don't exist

### Important Variables
- `drill: ElectricMiningDrill` - Reference to mining drill entity
- `chest: WoodenChest` - Reference to output chest
- `boiler: Boiler` - Reference to boiler entity
